back increase points working even across sides of poncho continue in pattern working 3 rnds double_crochet followed by 1 round single_crochet joining with slip_stitch at end of ea round and chaining up to proper height to begin next round change colors at random or in a stripe pattern of your choice reserving enough yarn for fringe when poncho is desired length finish with 2 rnds single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends neckline working in free loops on opposite side of beg chain at neck join yarn at center back chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends finishing to make fringe wind yarn around a 5 or 6 measure several times cut through one end of wraps to form strands attach one strand in ea single_crochet around bottom edge of poncho by inserting hook into st fold strand of fringe in half over hook pull loop through fabric then pull ends of strands through loop on hook and tighten knot blocking if necessary block poncho by following care instructions on ball band of your chosen yarn lay poncho flat on thick towels spreading it out with increase points aligned evenly cover with damp towels and leave to dry copyright 2017
